linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: NVIDIA 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 or better / NVIDIA 8600M or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any video card with 512MB or more of memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
